page.title: 07UCKFIELD'S INDUSTRY 2.
page.content: A questionnaire sent to each of the forty or so existing factories revealed some surprising facts. One would have expected to find a considerable{workforce}resident on the site but analysis of the survey replies showed that many operations were being run by as few as five or six workers. In some cases such a workforce was satisfying not only a U.K.{market}but also a number of overseas customers as well. One of the largest{employers}proved to be a local printing works supplying, as one of its many products,a free weekly advertising paper the name of which has become a household word in the area. They employ some one hundred and forty people and far exceed any other employer in the area.
